user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable, high-quality clothing that is versatile and suitable for everyday wear, with features that enhance usability and longevity.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a t-shirt that not only provided comfort but also had features like odour protection and moisture-wicking capabilities. The promise of keeping me cool and dry was a significant factor in my decision, as I often engage in activities where these features are essential. The high rating and positive reviews also influenced my choice, as they indicated a level of satisfaction from other customers.

I wanted a versatile long-sleeve tee made from soft, breathable cotton that I could wear frequently. The preshrunk fabric was appealing because it promised durability and ease of care. The variety of colors available also played a role in my decision, allowing me to choose something that matched my style. The high rating reassured me of its quality.

I was in search of affordable yet high-quality everyday clothing. The emphasis on comfort and consistent sizing was important to me, as I wanted to avoid the hassle of returns due to sizing issues. The positive feedback from other customers about the product's quality and comfort further solidified my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer good value for money, comfort, and practicality. I appreciate items that are well-made, durable, and provide a flattering fit, especially in clothing. Features like moisture-wicking fabric, wrinkle resistance, and easy care are important to me. I also value products that are versatile enough for both casual and work settings. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that are uncomfortable, poorly fitting, or made from harsh materials. I have a particular aversion to products that lack support or are not suitable for everyday wear, especially in the case of undergarments.

Item No.3 : Item Title: <ToBeInStyle Women's Cotton-Blend Crew-Neck Staple Top with Long Sleeves> / Item ID: B01AU3CPZ4 / Price: $17.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Tops Tees & Blouses', 'T-Shirts'] / Description: ["ToBeInStyle prides itself in providing top quality clothing to its customers. We sell simple, yet elegant tops, bottoms, coats, and more that are made to last, while delivering fashionable, affordable and comfortable apparel. Basic doesn't have to be boring. Stock up on these Cotton-Blend Crew-Neck Staple Tops to use as base layering pieces or for pairing with any of your pants for a simple, casual look. Made of a cotton-spandex blend, these shirts can be cool and breathable for when it gets too hot, yet can still keep you warm on those chillier evenings. They're perfect for stretching out your summer wardrobe during the transition to fall."]

Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Originals Women’s Long Sleeve Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt, Lightweight V-Neck Tee, Modern Fit> / Item ID: B01I21CI30 / Price: $10.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Tops Tees & Blouses', 'T-Shirts'] / Description: ["We've updated this Hanes® Originals long-sleeve women's t-shirt, giving it a slimmer, more contemporary silhouette than our classic fit. Crafted from soft, U.S.-grown cotton and featuring a flattering V-neck, this women's tee has the look and feel of a high-end tee without the designer price tag. Longer length hem is well-suited for tucking in- or not. Wear it as a standout top layer or under your favorite sweatshirt or jacket. One thing's for sure: you'll wear this modern classic on repeat. Size up if you prefer a roomier fit."]

Made from soft, lightweight cotton grown in the U.S., this crewneck tee for women has the look and feel of a high-fashion brand with a slim, contemporary fit. (Size up if you prefer a roomier fit.) Longer length hem is well-suited for tucking in - or not. It's your call! Perfect for layering under a sweatshirt or jacket or just wearing solo, one thing is for sure. You'll wear this modern classic on repeat."]
